EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Salesforce - Barclays Africa
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Colleague
1. Your Salesforce account has been created. Please look out for the email from Salesforce, click on the link and set up a new password and security question
2. The next time you want to log on you can do so by clicking on the Barclays Africa button (no need to enter your username and password) on the page: https://absa1.my.salesforce.com
3. Add this page to your Favourites
4. Alternatively, bookmark the Single sign-on (SSO) link which will log you directly into Salesforce (after you have set up your new password and security question in Step 1). To add the link to your Favourites / Bookmarks, right click on this link, SSO Bookmark, copy the hyperlink and save it in your Favourites / Bookmarks
5. To set up access from a tablet device, log into Salesforce and follow the link to view the instructions:
iOS
https://absa1.my.salesforce.com
Android
https://absa1.my.salesforce.com
6. For Mobile Device access you will use your username (in the form of firstname.surname@absa1.com) and the password you created when you logged in for the first time
7. To access the training go to My Learning System and search for the ‘Salesforce Fundamentals’ training course
8. Please email all queries to Salesforce Support - Barclays Africa (SalesforceSupport@absa.co.za) or, preferably, post your questions to the Salesforce Help and Support Chatter group
